title: So Aurelion Sol...
body:
It's not just me... Either Aurelion Sol needs buffs or the entirety of all champions who can just easily dash into Sol's Circle of stars all needs nerfs.

He's at a super fucking low 48% winrate with an abysmally low playrate so the question stands...
When will we either see Aurelion Sol buffs or all counters to Aurelion Sol (every assassin + every champ with a dash in their kit), being nerfed?
